example.name: passive
example.text: The drug will be given treatment investigational new drug status, [a label]-1 accorded [*trace*-1] to drugs believed effective but lacking formal approval.
example.note: Do NOT assign any tagging to structures such as 'according to Mary, John is an idiot.' That 'accord' is not a verb, but some kind of weird preposition. Such instances will occur in a PP node without another primary preposition.
example.arg: to drugs believed effective but lacking formal approval.

example.name: active
example.text: Several of the city's black leaders, including Democratic mayoral nominee David Dinkins, have spoken out for racial gerrymandering [*0] [*T*-1] to accord blacks and Hispanics ``the fullest opportunity for representation.''

predicate.note: Frames file for 'accord' based on sentences in wsj.
